verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, my passion in life is to know You.
May all other goals bow down to
This journey of loving You more.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Hear my heart's cry,
And my prayer for this life:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Above all else,
Above all else,
Above all else,
Give me Yourself.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, You've shower'd Your goodness on me.
You've given Your gifts so freely,
But there's one thing I'm longing for.
